data.event: Somerset was first settled in 1677 on the Shawomet lands, and was officially incorporated in 1790.
Somerset was first settled in 1677 on the Shawomet lands, and was officially incorporated in 1790.
In 1872, it became the site of a major coal port, and in the early 20th century a large cannery existed in the town.

event.title: Today, the town's major industry (other than suburban services) is power generation, with the Montaup Electric Company plant upriver (founded

data.event: Today, the town's major industry (other than suburban services) is power generation, with the Montaup Electric Company plant upriver (founded in 1923) and the Brayton Point Power Plant at the town's southern tip (founded in 1963).

data.event: Today, the town's major industry (other than suburban services) is power generation, with the Montaup Electric Company plant upriver (founded in 1923) and the Brayton Point Power Plant at the town's southern tip (founded in 1963).
